title: Mass Spectrometry based Isotopomers Parsing
text: MSIP designed Mass Specrometry based Isotopomer Parsing. boost comprehensive metabolic flux analysis ( MFA ) based Isotopomer.

title: Mass Spectrometry based Isotopomers Parsing
text: • Isotopologues molecules differing isotopic composition. Two isotopologues chemical species, least one atom containing different number neutrons. term isotopologue derived ‘isotope’ ‘homologue’. • Isotopomers defined molecules number isotopic atom, differing positions. term isotopomer portmanteau ‘isotope’ ‘isomer’.

title: Mass Spectrometry based Isotopomers Parsing
text: complicated biological metabolic network, metabolic process reflected isotopologues, especailly mulitple reactions generating isotopologue distinct isotopomers.
